name: centrality
summary: Find most important nodes in road network
description:
The centrality command identifies the most important nodes in the road network using betweenness centrality. High-centrality nodes are critical junctions where many routes pass through.

Uses sampling for large networks to maintain reasonable performance.

options.-n, --top: Number of top central nodes to return (default: 20)

output:
List of most central nodes with:
- Rank and centrality score
- Node coordinates
- Connected road names
- Degree (number of connections)

GeoJSON output includes point features for each central node.
